attributes.action: Ensure that pay awards for school staff are fully funded by government
attributes.additional_details: Schools do not have the finance to pay for staff pay awards. Teachers and support staff deserve a pay rise, but this must be fully funded by the government. Failure to fully fund will see schools cutting jobs and courses. This will directly impact on student outcomes and well being.
attributes.background: We want any pay award for school staff (teachers and support staff) to be FULLY funded by the government.
